title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-4.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-4.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

All official motor vehicle emissions inspection stations
shall be subject to audits, as described in this Subpart, by persons designated
by the department, to determine conformance with this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
217-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
